snippet: Mr. Gervino is a former executive editor of Hearst Magazines International, and has been an editor at various lifestyle and sports magazines.
abstract: Billboard names Tony Gervino as editor, latest in series of changes to remake magazine in more general-interest direction; he is former executive editor of Hearst Magazines International.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Gervino is a former executive editor of Hearst Magazines International, and has been an editor at various lifestyle and sports magazines.

headline.main: Billboard Names Tony Gervino as Editor
headline.print_headline: Billboard Names an Editor With a Focus Beyond Music
